subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even if Robinson Cano would fit nicely into the Mets’ batting order behind David Wright, it seems a dinner between Cano’s representatives and the Mets front office was just that, dinner.
snippet: Even if Robinson Cano would fit nicely into the Mets’ batting order behind David Wright, it seems a dinner between Cano’s representatives and the Mets front office was just that, dinner.
